thread.section_title: Hotel Adele & Jules - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Central boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Central boutique hotel - Review of Hotel Adele & Jules, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mathieu M
title: Central boutique hotel
text:
This little boutique hotel really consists of two identical hotels side by side. It is conveniently located in the centre of Paris, and within walking distance of many attractions.
Front desk staff are friendly and efficient. The hotel is nicely decorated with bright colors. Rooms are a bit small, as one would expect in Paris, but they're well furnished, comfortable and functional.
